longmessage.ph: Renames selected entities by prefixing with a given string.

Translate a selection of elements multiple times along a global axis (X, Y, or Z) or define a local axis. Choose a global axis or direction, or select a node and system to define a local coordinate system.

Translate a selection of elements multiple times along a global axis (X, Y, or Z) or define a local axis. Choose a global axis or direction, or select a node and system to define a local coordinate system.

shortmessage.ph: Choose the magnitude, direction and number of copies to make.

Refines elements in heat affected zone around seam welds.
